actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1378.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 13007 to amend the Consumer Credit Protection Act to establish rights, remedies, and responsibilities for all participants in the utilization of electronic fund transfer services.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 13007 (Consumer Credit Protection Act amendments).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 13007 to amend the Consumer Credit Protection Act to establish rights, remedies, and responsibilities for all participants in the utilization of electronic fund transfer services.
